objects.text:
• 184L Capacity
• 9 Hours Cooling Retention
• Adjustable Shelves
• Energy Efficient

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description:
- Brand: Whirlpool.
- Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S.
- Capacity: 184 litres.
- Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year.
- Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres.
- Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres.
- Bottle Count: 4.
- Installation Type: Freestanding.
- Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S.
- Form Factor: Stand Alone.
- Special Features: Adjustable Shelves.
- Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z.
- Voltage: 220.
- Wattage: 205 Watts.
- Number of Drawers: 4.
- Defrost System: Automatic.
- Door Orientation: Left.
- Door Material: Stainless Steel.
- Shelf Type: Wire.
- Number of Shelves: 2.
- Certification: Energy Rating.
- Material: Stainless Steel.
- Batteries Required: No.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd.
- Plot No.
- A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800.
- Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 count.
- Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
This visually engaging banner is divided into two main sections separated by a vertical red line. The left half includes promotional text elements: a bold headline (`heading_1` and `heading_2`), a vibrant red text block for urgency (`tagline`), a smaller sub-header for limited-time messaging (`subheading`), and product features detailed in bullet points (`description`). Below this, a large price highlight (`price`) and a red call-to-action button with white text (`cta_background` and `cta`) are placed for strong visual emphasis. On the right, there's a fridge product image (`product_image`) with overlaid cooling information and brand/model identification (`brand_name`, `product_model`).

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red: #d72300  
- Cream White: #f4ebdc  
- Dark Burgundy: #3e2021  
- Muted Gray: #555555  
- Charcoal Brown: #3c2b2c  
- Sapphire Blue: (from product image)
product_color: The product image features a Whirlpool refrigerator characterized by a deep and rich royal blue color (#10003A), which exudes a premium and modern appeal. The center body blends gradients of dark navy blue (#0A1B66) to slightly lighter bluish-purple hues (#3B3F94) towards the sides, creating a smooth, luxurious finish. The white text and snowflake icon (#FFFFFF) contrast sharply with the background, making key features like "9 HOURS COOLING RETENTION" highly legible and attention-grabbing. The color palette for an advertisement banner can include royal blue (#10003A), white (#FFFFFF), silver-gray (#B0B4C8), and accent light blue (#A6C8FF) for highlights and emphasis.
